participant_2.background:

i m allergic to cats.
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.

content.text: Hi there, what do you enjoy doing in your free time?
I enjoy reading about different cultures and learning about the world.  How about you?
I like to watch YouTube videos of my favorite bands, and I love to cook.  What do you do to keep fit?
I try to get some activity in most days of the week, but I don't have a specific exercise routine.
That's great.  I'm slightly overweight, but my doctors say I'm healthy.  What's the most difficult decision you've ever made?
My most difficult decision was to leave my family behind when I moved away to college.
I can imagine that was hard.  I'm glad you made it through.
Thank you.  I'm a teacher now, and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
That's great!  What's your favorite food?
I love all kinds of food, but my favorite is probably pizza.  What's yours?
I love pizza too!  I also love pasta.  I'm a big foodie.
